Topic.Title: I can't update my date of birth

Posts.EditableText:
Hi everyone,

I can't update my date of birth (which is necessary so I can access a particular game). 

It says "Profile updated successfully." but when I refresh it's no longer there and I still can't access the game. 

What's going on?

Thanks in advance!!!
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone,

I can't update my date of birth (which is necessary so I can access a particular game).

It says "Profile updated successfully." but when I refresh it's no longer there and I still can't access the game.

What's going on?

Thanks in advance!!!

Posts.EditableText:
try logging out - closing your browser - then reopen it and log back in. You should then be able to get where you want.
If not, you'll have to wait for someone else to guide you.
Posts.HTML:
try logging out - closing your browser - then reopen it and log back in. You should then be able to get where you want.
If not, you'll have to wait for someone else to guide you.

Posts.EditableText: If all else fails, PM me and I will have a go at it. It is not something I have done before, so I cannot promise even then.
